vraqtE tavA&nA#gasOq adi#tayE syAma ||
daqdhiqkrAv^^NNO# akAriShaM jiqShNOraSva#sya vAqjina#H ||
suqraqBinOq muKA# karaqt praNaq AyU(gm)#Shi tAriShat ||
A da#dhiqkrAH Sava#sAq pa~jca# kRuqShTIH sUrya# ivaq jyOti#ShAq&pasta#tAna |
saqhaqsraqsAH Sa#taqsA vAqjyarvA# pRuqNaktuq maddhvAq samiqmA vacA(gm)#si ||
aqgnirmUqrdhA>1, Buva#H>2 | 
maru#tOq yaddha# vO diqvaH su#mnAq yantOq havA#mahE |
